body.query: mutation AddInventoryItem($name: String!, $sku: String!, $quantity: Int!, $warehouse: String!) { addInventoryItem(name: $name, sku: $sku, quantity: $quantity, warehouse: $warehouse) { id name sku quantity warehouse } }
query GetInventoryItems($limit: Int, $offset: Int) { inventoryItems(limit: $limit, offset: $offset) { id name sku quantity warehouse } }

mutation UpdateInventoryItem($id: ID!, $name: String, $sku: String, $quantity: Int, $warehouse: String) { updateInventoryItem(id: $id, name: $name, sku: $sku, quantity: $quantity, warehouse: $warehouse) { id name sku quantity warehouse } }
query GetShipment($id: ID!) { shipment(id: $id) { id origin destination status estimatedDelivery } }

mutation AddShipment($origin: String!, $destination: String!, $status: String!, $estimatedDelivery: String!) { addShipment(origin: $origin, destination: $destination, status: $status, estimatedDelivery: $estimatedDelivery) { id origin destination status estimatedDelivery } }
mutation UpdateShipmentStatus($id: ID!, $status: String!) { updateShipmentStatus(id: $id, status: $status) { id origin destination status estimatedDelivery } }
query GetSuppliers { suppliers { id name contactPerson phone email } }

mutation AddSupplier($name: String!, $contactPerson: String!, $phone: String!, $email: String!) { addSupplier(name: $name, contactPerson: $contactPerson, phone: $phone, email: $email) { id name contactPerson phone email } }

mutation UpdateSupplier($id: ID!, $name: String, $contactPerson: String, $phone: String, $email: String) { updateSupplier(id: $id, name: $name, contactPerson: $contactPerson, phone: $phone, email: $email) { id name contactPerson phone email } }
